name: reappearance
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of appearing again or returning after a period of time: The singer has made his long-awaited reappearance after his illness. The virus was dormant, but its reappearance was only a matter of time. See
reappear
More examplesFewer examplesThere is speculation about his intentions following his sudden reappearance in public last Friday.She was disturbed by his sudden reappearance in her life.The newspapers all reported on her mysterious disappearance and reappearance.His illness cleared up before a reappearance of his symptoms. There are several reasons for the reappearance of these animals, once believed extinct.
